content:
Foreign Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Kuleba called on Western partners to urgently strengthen Ukraine's air protection, including Patriot systems and missiles.

This is said instatementDmitry Kuleba.

He commented on a Russian rocket strike, which was stacked in Kiev on March 25, 2024.

"Children in Kiev run to shelter at 10:30 am, when a deadly Russian ballistic missile is beating over the capital," the minister said.

According to him, there are no outrages that would not be committed by Russian freaks, including an attempt by a ballistic blow to the heart of a multimillion -dollar city.

"This is a reminder that Ukraine urgently needs enhanced air protection, including Patriot systems and missiles, capable of reflecting any attack by Russia," Dmytro Kuleba said.

SeePhoto reportArmyinform with the consequences of the attack on March 25, 2024 to Kiev.
title: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs called on the event to urgently provide Ukraine with Patriot
